description: generate_authors() in openstack.common.setup does not include authors listed in Co-authored-by: lines in the commit message.  It should.
title: generate_authors() does not include Co-authored-by

comments.content: generate_authors() in openstack.common.setup does not include authors listed in Co-authored-by: lines in the commit message.  It should.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content: Added nova to track pulling in the fix from oslo-incubator.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/25016
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/25016
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/oslo-incubator/commit/6e8b9ba12c96cbf422edd54a6cb12cbc0df66514
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 6e8b9ba12c96cbf422edd54a6cb12cbc0df66514
Author: Monty Taylor <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Mar 21 10:57:23 2013 -0500

    Include Co-authored-by entries in AUTHORS.
    
    Co-authored-by lines are the way we've decided to indicated shared
    authorship of a patch, so content from them should be included in
    the generated AUTHORS file.
    
    Fixes bug 1158319.
    
    Change-Id: I9dacf78c01f3ad74e696f16a7aa39edb98e8d185
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit b93de106dfd59cd3f9b33328430340cc1473b2f5
Author: Thierry Carrez <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Mar 25 16:25:30 2013 +0100

    Import latest openstack.common.setup
    
    Import latest openstack.common.setup from oslo-incubator.
    Fixes bug 1158319 (Include Co-authored-by entries in AUTHORS), but also:
    * stop using --stat for ChangeLog
    * failing to get version from git
    * returncode for Popen is valid only after communicate call
    
    Change-Id: Ib7a391560ec885b5478208cd441ce2c10e9d8cac
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: The fix wasn't complete, so this still isn't fixed in nova rc2: https://github.com/openstack/oslo-incubator/commit/47e9e98d6
